steps.goal: Open TikTok and stop when one video is visible in the main feed. Do not open comments in this step.

Tap the comments button (speech bubble) for the current video using the button on the right-side action rail. Stop only when the comments panel/list is visible. Do not scroll the main feed. If coordinates are invalid, wait and re-read screen instead of guessing.

Keep the comments panel open. Use the deterministic action like_nth_comment with query='3'. This taps the small heart icon on the 3rd visible comment row. Do NOT use find_and_tap. Do NOT tap usernames/comment text. Do NOT tap the video's main like button. Do NOT return done until after executing like_nth_comment.

Passive verification only. Use verify_nth_comment_like with query='3' to check the 3rd visible comment row. Do NOT use find_and_tap. Do NOT tap, scroll, or navigate. If verify_nth_comment_like succeeds, return done. If it fails, return wait without interacting.
